channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: A news site that covers Haitian-Americans is facing harassment over its post-debate coverage of Ohio
item.description: Journalists at a news site that covers issues facing the Haitian community in the United States say they’ve been harassed and intimidated with racist messages for covering the false story about immigrants eating the pets of people in Springfield, Ohio.

item.title: Vermont caps emergency motel housing for homeless, forcing many to leave this month
item.description: This fall, hundreds of the most vulnerable people experiencing homelessness in Vermont must leave state-funded motel rooms where they’ve been living as the state winds down its pandemic-era motel voucher program.

item.title: Voters view Harris more favorably as she settles into role atop Democratic ticket: AP-NORC poll
item.description: A new poll finds voters view Vice President Kamala Harris slightly more favorably than they did in July, just after President Joe Biden dropped out of the race.
